response.explain: The task has been successfully completed as per the original subtasks. The last action was to serve the platter with the cooked potato on the breakfast table, which was executed without any errors. Therefore, there are no more steps to be taken.
response.subtask:
(1) Move to the fridge
(2) Open the fridge
(3) Take out the potato
(4) Cook the potato
(5) Move to the bottom cabinet
(6) Open the bottom cabinet
(7) Take out the platter
(8) Put the cooked potato on the platter
(9) Move to the breakfast table
(10) Serve the platter with the cooked potato on the breakfast table
response.code: # No code is needed as the task has been completed.
